product_specification.USB Port: 1 x USB Type-C Port, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Ports, 1 x USB 2.0 Port

product_description.Enjoy Work and Play: This gaming laptop is equipped with NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 graphics and the 10th Gen Intel Core Processor so that you can enjoy using it for work and entertainment.
product_description.Aesthetic Design: This gaming laptop has an eye-catching design and an optional backlit keyboard so that you can enjoy its aesthetic appeal and also conveniently use it in dark environments.
product_description.Fast Network: This gaming laptop offers easy updates and a full range of connectivity options. And, with Dual-band Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) gives you improved average network throughput along with reduced latency.
product_description.Ample Storage: This gaming laptop offers strong power and ample storage so that you can easily carry out various tasks, making it a hassle-free experience every time you use it.
product_description.Connectivity Options: This gaming laptop ensures fast data transfers with the USB-C feature with USB 5 Gbps. Along with the other USB ports and an HDMI port, you can enjoy easy connectivity, offline charging, and more.

review:
Here is my review on this laptop after using for 2 weeks.

I've heard that this laptop heats up really quickly, but I didn't felt any thing like that. This laptop never reaches more than 10 degrees above my room temperature, even after I game on it for 4 hours. This can run mostly all games on high setting with 60 fps. I personally have tried 2 games on it valorant and apex legends both runs on high setting with 60 fps. And even this gives me 60 fps with high settings while recording in Valorant.

My usage:-
1. Gaming
2. Programming
3. Studying
4. Entertainment
And this laptop fulfill all my needs.

Overall this is a really good laptop in this price range. Go for it.
Good Product, I am satisfied all of the features, except battery life, It is very awesome product, wheather have a little bits of improvement in battery life time.

Performance is good as I expect in this price segment they giving intel i5 10gen with 4gb nvidia 1650 there are no issue with normal use like surfing web and it can handle some heavy application like matlab etc it's good for coding etc. If you are a heavy gamer this will not satisfy you but it suits for entry level and lite gamers. Worst battery back up it stands for 2 hours in normal usage and in heavy usage it will stands max 1 hours. But it's a value for money laptop and in this price segment there are some laptops like hp pavilion gaming but this laptop is far better than that because of the ssd it will boot under 9seconds so go for it but consider some cons I have mentioned.

Wifi 6. Connectivity Is good.

Giving A review After 1 week Of Usage
💪BATTERY- Before Purchasing acer aspire 7 I had read That it Gives about 1 -2 hour of battery Backup. But In my Case I am getting 3-4 Hours easily after Doing Full charge In Normal Usage(not Playing Games) By the way You can't expect more From a gaming Laptop
😎 BOOTING SPEED- It Boots In 7-10 seconds
😁 DISPLAY- It is a 15.6 inch display Which looks amazing
😏BUILD QUALITY- build Quality is average. What more you can expect From A 50k laptop( I had purchased It In Sale)
😑 GAMING- it gives Maximum Of 1 hour battery Backup while playing heavy Games And Yes you can play heavy games Like COD and GTA because In this laptop you get nvidia graphics card And 8GB Ram( expandable upto 32GB)
🤗🤗 MY OPINION- If You are A Student Then I am telling you to purchase this laptop because It will sustain easily 5-6 Years and Also For Gamers( You can Play heavy games On heavy Resolution by upgrading Ram to 16GB)

Pros:
- Value for money
- Perfect for everyday task
- Good processor(i5 10th gen - 10300H) and NVMe SSD made it ultra fast.(bios time around 2.5 seconds)
- Keyboard and trackpad are pretty good
- RTX 1650 can handle almost all games at 1080P. GTA V can run at high(not ultra) settings,
- Display is not so great but sure value for money (More than good for everyday use, if you want extra precession use a external monitor)
- USB C - type enables high quality speed and display
- No heating issues relatively cool compared to others in market
- Speakers are good for regular use. since the placement of speakers are straight down to laptop when it is given some air then you are good to go.

Cons
- The only con is battery life. (watched a 2.5 hour length movie + half hour surfing. which turned battery from 95 to 20)
on average you can expect 2.5 - 3.5 hours of battery life.

overall a vey good product

Performance:
So far, have been using it only for basic tasks like web browsing, attending meetings, and streaming video. For this usage, it feels snappy.
No major hiccups were found even while running some light games. Since this was bought for the tasks mentioned above, I think this gets the job done.

Screen:
The stock wallpaper made the display look much worse. But after changing to a high-resolution one, it looks better. The 1080p screen is just adequate for the display size. Both max and min brightness levels are good.

Audio/Speaker:
Does the job well enough.

Battery life:
With about medium brightness, it lasts about 4hrs which I think is the norm in this price range.

Keyboard & Trackpad:
The keyboard is a mixed bag.

Pros:
1. Backlit keys
2. Key presses are not very loud
3. The keys feel firm and are not wobbly.

Cons:
1. While it has a full keyboard layout, the key sizes have been reduced. This is annoying for someone that is used to much bigger keys on even smaller laptops.
2. The keys have very little key travel, making it harder to feel the type.
3. The trackpad looks tiny for the laptop's size.
4. The trackpad position is off-centered towards the left and this makes it difficult to access while you are typing away.

Design & Ports:
For this price range, this laptop is extremely good-looking. Even though it is made of plastic, there is no flex, and feels very well built. The weight seems manageable too for the size. The port selection on this laptop is plentiful and they are all useful too.

Overall:
Though there are some annoying things about the keyboard and trackpad, I feel this is a good overall package for the price.

Pros -
1- Absolutely value for money at this price range.
2- Excellent performance.
3- Build quality is quite good.
4- I haven't face any over heating issue since using 7 days, It can run most of the AAA title Games those are release before 2018 at 40 - 50 fps in High to Ultra settings and not exceeding 70 -75 °C temperature.
5- Hing quality is very good (If you use it delicately).

Cons -
1- Battery backup is upto 3 hours while doing lite work like browsing, watching movies, etc. and 1 hour while doing heavy task like playing games, video editing, etc.
2- You have to compromise for storage, 512 GB SSD is not sufficient because if you install more than 100 GB size games like Red Dead Redemption 2, Call of Duty Morden Warfare series, etc. then you can able to install only 3-4 games at a time.
3- You feel slightly flex on display and on the top panel.
4- You can also notice slightly IPS glow and screen bleeding on the bezels and at the corners of the display in a completely dark room with full brightness (It is quite common in every display except OLED).
5- At the starting days you have to struggle with all the ports specially charging port of the laptop because it's very tightly fit.

If your budget is under Rs 50,000 and if you can compromise with all these cons then you should definitely go with Acer Aspire 7.

pros.Performance: The Intel core i5 10th gen processor is fast and gives excellent and smooth performance.
pros.512 GB SSD: Boots up really fast due to the SSD. Takes normally 5-7 seconds to boot up.
pros.39.62 cm (15.6 inch) 1920 x 1080 Pixels: Display quality is top-notch and with a 15.6 inch screen it gives the ultimate viewing experience.

cons.Sound: The sound quality is not upto the mark. Speaker volume is very low.
cons.Battery: Battery drains really fast. Gives a backup of 4-5 hours on normal use and around 1-2 hours on gaming.

summary.verdict: The Acer Aspire 7 Core i5 10th Gen laptop is designed for gamers to have the best gaming experience under a budget.
summary.Additional Information: Supports AAA titles, Good for editing purpose, 60hz display.
